search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Kixie (kixie.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Kixie is [https://www.kixie.com/pricing/](https://www.kixie.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

=========================

    & reporting

*   Unlimited  
    solutions engineering
*   Custom integrations
*   Custom workflows

Available Add-Ons
-----------------

ConnectionBoost™
----------------

Kixie [ConnectionBoost™](https://www.kixie.com/features/connectionboost/) is a dynamic feature that helps your sales teams connect with 500% more leads. Simply put, your leads will answer the phone more often, and your sales reps will be able to call more frequently.

Local Presence
--------------

Increase connection rates by automatically dialing prospects using [numbers from their local area code](https://www.kixie.com/features/local-presence/).

Conversation Intelligence
-------------------------

AI-powered [Conversation Intelligence](https://www.kixie.com/features/conversation-intelligence/) platform to track sales calls, coach your team, and maintain comprehensive records in your CRM.

Do Not Call List Compliance
---------------------------

Automatically ensure all of your calls comply with the Federal Trade Commission’s (FTC) Do Not Call List. This is a crucial part of ensuring your call center compliance with federal regulations, and something all companies placing outbound cold-calls within the US should be aware of.

Unlimited Minutes
-----------------

US/Canada users can add unlimited minutes to any plan for $30 per user.

[Start trial](https://www.kixie.com/sign-up/)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Got a question? We’ve got answers. If you have some other questions, contact us [here](https://www.kixie.com/contact/).

Can I keep my existing phone number(s)?
---------------------------------------

We have different plans that grow with your business. Your unique plan depends on what countries you call and which features you would like to use. Whether you need a single phone line or hundreds, we have you covered.

Do you have different plans?
----------------------------

We have different plans that grow with your business. Your unique plan depends on what countries you call and which features you would like to use. Whether you need a single phone line or hundreds, we have you covered.

What are the international per-minute call rates?
-------------------------------------------------

We offer unlimited minutes plans for the US and Canada. per user. Otherwise, minutes are billed according to [current rates](https://www.kixie.com/pricing/per-minute-pricing/).

How much do text messages cost?
-------------------------------

Inbound text messages are 100% free of charge. The cost of sending text messages depends on the region of the number you are sending it to. They are typically very affordable and start at $0.011/text ($11 for every 1000 messages) for 10DLC registered numbers. Texts to US and Canada numbers are $0.011/text.  
For international texting rates, click [here](https://www.kixie.com/assets/img/uploads/Kixie-SMS-Pricing.pdf).  
For more information, please email [support@kixie.com](mailto:support@kixie.com).

How does the trial work?
------------------------

You have 7 days to trial our software to see what a smarter phone system can do for you. If you don’t think it is as great as we do, then canceling is simple.  
We don’t require a credit card, so if you forget to cancel your trial you don’t have to worry about getting charged.

What if I need extra phone numbers?
-----------------------------------

No problem! We give you your first US/Canada number (DID) for free, and then extra local US/Canada numbers are just $5.00 per month.  
Already have your own numbers? You can transfer US/Canada numbers into Kixie for free, and cancel your old service. We’ll host your numbers for free, and you can take them with you if you decide to cancel your account.  
For information regarding numbers outside the US and Canada, please email [support@kixie.com](mailto:support@kixie.com) with your inquiry.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing details are structured into tiers with additional features and usage-based options.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes Integrated features plus additional advanced features.
Professional features plus advanced dialing capabilities.
Comprehensive plan with AI and advanced analytics.

additional_fees.fee_description: Add unlimited minutes to any plan for US/Canada users.
